title: Monogram from Pantograph Lettering Style
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615215322im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/SatowThankYou_4531.jpg)

This monogram was engraved from a lettering style used in the Masterplate pantograph system.

The letters are engraved in reverse on 1/2‚Äù thick steel then it (the die) is die stamped on this vintage, onion skin paper (about 9#) then hand folded in our bindery, here.

Yesterday evening I realized how much the strokes remind me of Magnolia tree branches, we have several such trees in our yard.
author: nancy sharon collins
